scripts.integration-tests:backend-only: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration-tests.yml up testDB backend
scripts.e2e-tests: cross-env VITE_GRAPHQL_API_URL=http://host.docker.internal:4000 docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e-tests.yml up --build --exit-code-from testrunner --remove-orphans
scripts.e2e-tests:app-only: docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e-tests.yml up testDB backend client --build   --remove-orphans
scripts.start:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml --env-file .env.production up
scripts.start:staging: docker compose -f docker-compose.staging.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.staging.yml --env-file .env.staging up
scripts.publish:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t mickael01/green-gesture-server:latest && docker push mickael01/green-gesture-server:latest && cd ..
scripts.publish-staging:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t mickael01/green-gesture-server:staging && docker push mickael01/green-gesture-server:staging && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t mickael01/green-gesture-client:latest && docker push mickael01/green-gesture-client:latest && cd ..
scripts.publish-staging:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t mickael01/green-gesture-client:staging && docker push mickael01/green-gesture-client:staging && cd ..
scripts.publish:stripe-service: cd stripe-service && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t mickael01/green-gesture-microservice-stripe:latest && docker push mickael01/green-gesture-microservice-stripe:latest && cd ..
scripts.publish:discord-bot: cd discord-bot && docker build -f Dockerfile . -t mickael01/discord-bot && docker push mickael01/discord-bot && cd ..
